Class Club

      • logic.Club

    public class Club
extends Weapon
    This class is the base of every weapon in the game giving basic movability to it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Club

        public Club(int newX,
            int newY,
            boolean newMove)
        Creates a Club in preferred x and y values. Is possible to choose if the Club is static relatively to the owner.
        Parameters:
        newX - the new value of x
        newY - the new value of y
        newMove - the value to be passed to Club constructor indicating possibility of movement

      • Club

        public Club(int newX,
            int newY)
        Creates a movable Club in preferred position.
        Parameters:
        newX - the new value of x
        newY - the new value of y
